Publication Title: Exploring chronic and transient tumor hypoxia for predicting the efficacy of hypoxia-activated pro-drugs
Publication Authors: Shreya Mathur, Shannon Chen, Katarzyna A Rejniak
Publication Abstract: Hypoxia, a low level of oxygen in the tissue, arises due to an imbalance between the vascular oxygen supply and oxygen demand by the surrounding cells. Typically, hypoxia is viewed as a negative marker of patients' survival, because of its implication in the development of aggressive tumors and tumor resistance.
